mapper.insert: /* SideMenuStoreMapper.getSideMenuClassStoreSaveMerge */ MERGE INTO TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_CLASS_REG_STORE USING DUAL ON ( HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND SDSEL_CLASS_CD = #{sdselClassCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, SDSEL_CLASS_CD, STORE_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, #{sdselClassCd}, #{storeCd}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* SideMenuStoreMapper.getSideMenuProdStoreSaveMerge */ MERGE INTO TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_PROD_REG_STORE USING DUAL ON ( HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND SDSEL_CLASS_CD = #{sdselClassCd} AND PROD_CD = #{sdselProdCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, SDSEL_CLASS_CD, PROD_CD, STORE_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, #{sdselClassCd}, #{sdselProdCd}, #{storeCd}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.select:
/* SideMenuStoreMapper.getSideMenuProdRegStoreList */
SELECT A.SDSEL_GRP_CD, A.SDSEL_GRP_NM, B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD, B.SDSEL_CLASS_NM, NVL(B.REQUIRE_YN, 'N') AS REQUIRE_YN, C.PROD_CD AS SDSEL_PROD_CD, D.PROD_NM AS SDSEL_PROD_NM, NVL(C.FIX_PROD_FG, '0') AS FIX_PROD_FG, NVL(C.REG_STORE_FG, '0') AS REG_STORE_FG, NVL(C.REG_STORE_FG, '0') AS OLD_REG_STORE_FG, D.REMARK
FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_GROUP A, TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_CLASS B, TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_PROD C, TB_HQ_PRODUCT D WHERE 1=1 AND A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND A.SDSEL_GRP_CD LIKE '%'||#{sdselGrpCd}||'%'
AND A.SDSEL_GRP_NM LIKE '%'||#{sdselGrpNm}||'%'
AND B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD LIKE '%'||#{sdselClassCd}||'%'
AND B.SDSEL_CLASS_NM LIKE '%'||#{sdselClassNm}||'%'
AND D.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND D.HQ_BRAND_CD = #{prodHqBrandCd} -- 선택한 상품브랜드가 있을 때
-- 선택한 상품브랜드가 없을 때('전체' 일때), 사용자 관리브랜드에 속한 정보만 조회 AND D.HQ_BRAND_CD IN
#{item}
AND C.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{sdselProdCd}||'%'
AND D.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{sdselProdNm}||'%'
AND NVL(C.REG_STORE_FG, '0') = #{regStoreFg}
AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND B.SDSEL_GRP_CD = A.SDSEL_GRP_CD AND C.HQ_OFFICE_CD = B.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND C.SDSEL_CLASS_CD = B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD AND D.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= C.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND D.PROD_CD (+)= C.PROD_CD ORDER BY B.DISP_SEQ, C.DISP_SEQ
